tasks.test: deno task test-new-front-end-transpiler && deno task full-macro-test && deno task test-import
tasks.full-macro-test: deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ./examples/import/simple2/b.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ./examples/import/simple/b.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ./examples/import/module2.hql
tasks.test-import: deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ./examples/import.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ./examples/macro-import-default-module.hql && deno run -A ./cli/run.ts ./examples/macro-import-name-space.hql
